title: Default Sorting
content: Enable the sorting function by setting the sortable attribute of the table column.
findIntroStr: Table component, which provides powerful data table functions. In Grid, data lists can be displayed, selected, and edited.

title: Unique Primary Key
content: Set the row-id field name of the unique primary key of user-defined row data in a table. The default value of this property is _XID
findIntroStr: Table component, which provides powerful data table functions. In Grid, data lists can be displayed, selected, and edited.

title: Multi-field sorting
content: Set the sortable attribute of the table column to enable the sorting function of the column, and then set the sort-by attribute to implement multi-field sorting. An array list is a sorted list of fields.
findIntroStr: Table component, which provides powerful data table functions. In Grid, data lists can be displayed, selected, and edited.

title: Custom Sorting
content: Set the sortable attribute of the table column to enable the sorting function for the column, and then set the sort-method method to implement user-defined sorting.
findIntroStr: Table component, which provides powerful data table functions. In Grid, data lists can be displayed, selected, and edited.

title: Manual Sorting
content: You can use the sort(field, order) method to manually sort tables. If order is empty, the sorting is automatically switched.
findIntroStr: Table component, which provides powerful data table functions. In Grid, data lists can be displayed, selected, and edited.

title: Table server sorting
content: Set the sortable attribute of the table column to enable the sorting function, and then set the remote-sort method to enable the sorting function on the server. In this example, the services/getGridMockData service needs to be implemented. The example simulates the data returned by the remote service.
findIntroStr: Table component, which provides powerful data table functions. In Grid, data lists can be displayed, selected, and edited.
